Attacks.Multiattack: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two iwth its claws.
Attacks.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.
Attacks.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
Attacks.ColdBreath: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
